Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Status of Antoine Corrado
Dear Sir,
Antoine Corrado seems overmatched at AA !
He has an ERA of 6.35 over there, so I think
you should demote him.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Status of Kevin Burk
Dear Sir,
Kevin Burk isn't hitting the ball at all at AA !
He has an AVG of .224, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Status of Horacio Velazquez
Dear Sir,
Horacio Velazquez has an AVG of .212 at AA !
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/6/1984
Subject: Status of Thomas Ogan
Dear Sir,
Thomas Ogan has an ERA of 5.36 at AA .
I believe he isn't ready yet for that level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/7/1984
Subject: Status of John Torre
Dear Sir,
John Torre shouldn't play at AA !
He has an AVG of .245 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
